avastAppDesc.message: Find the best prices, deals and discount coupons while shopping online with the price comparison and coupon extension by Avast.
avastAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message

avgAppDesc.message: Find the best prices, deals and discount coupons while shopping online with the price comparison and coupon extension by AVG.
avgAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message

avastAppLongName.message: Avast SafePrice | Price comparison, deals and coupons on safe shopping sites - Save Money

avgAppLongName.message: AVG SafePrice | Price comparison, deals and coupons on safe shopping sites - Save Money

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension

safePriceLeaveRating.message: Leave us a rating to show your love.
safePriceLeaveRating.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension

safePriceAskMeLater.description: It is showed to the user on the rating screen in order to offer it to rate extension later

spLoadingNotificationDescriptionMessage.message: It's worth the wait, we promise.

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersShowAll.message: Show whenever e-shop offers are available

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersBetter.message: Only show when e-shop offers better than the original price are available

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersHideAll.message: Do not notify me about e-shop offers

spSettingsTabNotificationsOffersHideAllD.message: (you can always see offers by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsTabNotificationsAccommodations.message: Show whenever better hotel price available
Show alternative hotels to what I request
Show popular hotels in requested area

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsShowAll.message: Show whenever a coupon is available

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsShowOnc.message: Show once on each website only

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsHide.message: Do not notify me about coupons

spSettingsTabNotificationsCouponsHideDes.message: (you can always see coupons by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsTabNotificationsOthersDesc.message: Notify me about special deals for other categories (transportation, finance, power supply and more)

spSettingsPageCustomListTitle.message: Don’t show any notifications on these websites:

spSettingsPageCustomListTitleDesc.message: (you can still always see offers and coupons by clicking on the toolbar icon)

spSettingsPrivacyNotice.message: Allow analysis of product performance and data usage for new product development

spSettingsPageHelpNotificationsTitleDesc.message: When SafePrice finds an offer or coupon related to your search, a notification will pop up. Click the big green button to see what we found for you.

spSettingsPageHelpOffersTitleDesc.message: Clicking on an offer will take you to a partner’s trusted online store, where you’ll get the new price listed on the notification.

spSettingsPageHelpCouponsTitleDesc.message: To use a coupon, all you have to do is click it. If it reveals a code, you’ll need to paste it into the appropriate field during checkout. Otherwise, the coupon is automatically applied.

spSettingsPageHelpOthersTitleDesc.message: Clicking on a listed special deal will take you to a partner’s trusted online store.

spSocialShare.description: It is showed up to users in order to make them share SafePrice on Social Networks

spSocialShareFb.description: It is showed up to users in order to make them share SafePrice on Facebook

spSocialSharetttr.description: It is showed up to users in order to make them share SafePrice on Twitter

spSearchForOffers.message:
To get offers, search for
a product

spSearchForCoupons.message:
To get coupons, search
for a brand or an online store

spNoResultsFound.description: %s is the domain where we couldn't find coupons or can be also, what the user wrote on our seach input

spNoResultsFoundCoupons.description: %s is the domain where we couldn't find coupons or can be also, what the user wrote on our seach input

spNoResultsFoundOffersBasedOnQuery.description: %s is the title of the product for which we couldn't find offers or can be also, what the user wrote on our seach input

spNoResultsFoundCouponsNow.message: No coupons found at the moment

spSiteVerified.message: This site is verified, and safe to shop on

spSiteNotVerified.message: This site is untrustworthy to shop on

spSiteNotVerifiedHover.message: This website has been identified as untrustworthy. Every deal we find comes from a safe website, so we suggest you click one of the offers above, or simply try somewhere else.

spConnectionNotSecureHover.message: This website doesn’t have a valid https certificate, therefore it can’t fully protect your privacy.

spSiteUntrustworthy.message: This website has been identified as untrustworthy

spSiteUntrustworthyDesc.message: We suggest you take your shopping elsewhere, as this site has been rated poorly by customers.

spPhishingSite.message: This website has been marked as a phishing site

spPhishingSiteDesc.message: Phishing is an attempt to acquire sensitive information such as usernames, passwords, and credit cards details.

spRecommendWhy.message: Why do you recommend this e-shop?*

spRecommendExcellentSelectionOfProducts.message: They have an excellent selection of products.

spReportWhy.message: Why are you reporting this e-shop?*

spReportPaidAndNotGet.message: I paid for a product and didn’t get it.

spReportGetSomethingDifferent.message: I got something different from what I ordered.

spReportTreatedMePoorly.message: They treated me poorly as a customer.

spThanksForVoting.message: Thank you for helping us make SafePrice better

spAfterCloseTooltip.message: You can always find SafePrice offers and coupons by clicking on the toolbar icon.
spAfterCloseTooltip.description: Small tooltips showed to the user after closing UI in order to remain users how to get UI back.

spAfterCloseTooltipGotIt.description: Confirm message showed on Small tooltips showed to the user after closing UI in order to remain users how to get UI back.

spOptInTitle.message: If you agree, SafePrice will show you cheaper deals when you shop online

spOptInTitleBAvast.message:
If you agree, Avast SafePrice
will show you cheaper deals and coupons when you shop online

spOptInTitleBAVG.message:
If you agree, AVG SafePrice
will show you cheaper deals and coupons when you shop online

spOptInPolice.message: SafePrice will scan the websites you visit so it can find you better deals and discount coupons on verified e-shops. For this functionality, it needs to send the following data to its servers:

spOptInPoliceBAvast.message: Avast SafePrice will scan the websites you visit so it can find you better deals and discount coupons on verified e-shops. For this functionality, it needs to send the following data to its servers:

spOptInPoliceBAVG.message: AVG SafePrice will scan the websites you visit so it can find you better deals and discount coupons on verified e-shops. For this functionality, it needs to send the following data to its servers:

spOptInPolice1.message: Domain or URL of shopping site

spOptInPoliceLink.message: See the extension’s Privacy Policy for full details.

spOptInSecondTitle.message: Sorry, SafePrice can’t show you cheaper deals without your consent

spOptInSecondTitleBAvast.message: Sorry, Avast SafePrice can’t show you cheaper deals without your consent

spOptInSecondTitleBAVG.message: Sorry, AVG SafePrice can’t show you cheaper deals without your consent

spOptInSecondText.message: Without it the extension won’t work. You can uninstall it.
